title: Arabic 18
text: Ask not of Me that which We desire not for thee, then be content with what We have ordained for thy sake, for this is that which profiteth thee, if therewith thou dost content thyself.

prev.title: Arabic 17
prev.text: Be thou content with Me and seek no other helper. For none but Me can ever suffice thee.

next.title: Arabic 19
next.exhort: O SON OF THE WONDROUS VISION!
next.text: I have breathed within thee a breath of My own Spirit, that thou mayest be My lover. Why hast thou forsaken Me and sought a beloved other than Me?
